mapper.select: SELECT nbno, subject, content, nickname, type, target, to_char(regdate, 'YYYY-MM-DD') as dbday, hit, num FROM (SELECT nbno, subject, content, nickname, type, target, regdate, hit, rownum as num FROM (SELECT nbno, subject, content, nickname, type, target, regdate, hit FROM noticeboard WHERE userid=#{id} ORDER BY nbno DESC)) WHERE num BETWEEN #{start} AND #{end}
SELECT nbno, subject, content, userid, nickname, type, target, to_char(regdate, 'YYYY-MM-DD') as dbday, hit, (SELECT namekor FROM wine WHERE wno=target) as namekor FROM noticeboard WHERE nbno=#{nbno}
